Generated by DocFX

Class Permissions.GlobalPermissionCommands

Provides commands for managing global permissions, allowing for the blocking or unblocking of specific commands and modules across all guilds.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

GlobalCommand(CommandOrCrInfo)

Toggles a command on or off the global block list.

Declaration
[Cmd("GlobalCommand")]
[Aliases("GlobalCommand")]
public Task GlobalCommand(CommandOrCrInfo cmd)
Parameters
Type Name Description
CommandOrCrInfo cmd

The command to toggle.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation to block or unblock the command globally.
Remarks

This command is restricted to bot owners. Certain commands, like "source", are protected from being globally disabled.

| Edit this page View Source

GlobalModule(ModuleOrCrInfo)

Toggles a module on or off the global block list.

Declaration
[Cmd("GlobalModule")]
[Aliases("GlobalModule")]
public Task GlobalModule(ModuleOrCrInfo module)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ModuleOrCrInfo module

The module to toggle.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation to block or unblock the module globally.
Remarks

This command is restricted to bot owners. It allows for specifying modules to be globally blocked or unblocked.

| Edit this page View Source

GlobalPermList()

Lists all currently globally blocked modules and commands.

Declaration
[Cmd("GlobalPermList")]
[Aliases("GlobalPermList")]
public Task GlobalPermList()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation to send the list of globally blocked modules and commands.
Remarks

This command is restricted to bot owners. It provides an overview of all modules and commands that have been globally restricted.

| Edit this page View Source

ResetGlobalPerms()

Resets all global permissions, clearing all global command and module blocks.

Declaration
[Cmd("ResetGlobalPerms")]
[Aliases("ResetGlobalPerms")]
public Task ResetGlobalPerms()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation to reset global permissions.
Remarks

This command is restricted to bot owners. Use this command with caution as it will remove all global restrictions.
